Content.title: Nico Lubbers
Content.name: Nico Lubbers
Content.bodyText:
That's a nice package Darren!

Would be great if it could work without even adding the dummyfield, but I guess that would require a modification in umbraco itself. 

Question: would it be possible to change the validation color? The intense red background makes it a bit hard to read the black characters

Nico
